required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of Probiotic and Symbiotic in Body Weight, Blood Sugar and Lipemia of Obese Women
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of Probiotic and Symbiotic in Body Weight, Blood Sugar and Lipemia of Obese Women

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

collaborator.agency: Rio de Janeiro State Research Supporting Foundation (FAPERJ)

clinical_study.source: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether contribute with weight loss and improvement of blood sugar and lipemia in obese women.

detailed_description.textblock: We will evaluate the effects of probiotic on anthropometric, laboratory, metabolomic, body and gut microbiota composition variables.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the effects of probiotic and symbiotic on weight loss of women obese in baseline and after 60 days.
primary_outcome.description: Determine and evaluate change in this parameters after intervention.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of probiotic and symbiotic on blood glucose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 60 days and 15 days after intervention conclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Determine and comparing the blood glucose before and after intevention

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect probiotic and symbiotic on insulin resistance by HOMA-IR calculation
secondary_outcome.description: Compare insulin resitance before and after intervention and evaluate whether the intervention improvement in this parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect probiotic and symbiotic on insulin sensitivity by QUICKY calculation
secondary_outcome.description: Compare insulin sensibility before and after intervention and evaluate whether the intervention improvement in this parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of probiotic and symbiotic on lipemia
secondary_outcome.description: Compare lipemia before and after intervention and evaluate whether the intervention improvement in this parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect probiotic and symbiotic on blood pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline,60 days and 15 days after intervention conclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Determine blood pressure before and 60 days of intervention and 15 days after intervention conclusion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of probiotic and symbiotic on compoused gut microbiota
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 60 days and 15 days after intervention conclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Determine and comparing the amount filos and Bifidobacterium lactist in gut microbiota

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of probiotic and symbiotic on stool consitency by Bristol scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline,60 days and 15 days after intervention conclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Determine and comparing the stool consistency.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of probiotic and symbiotic on gastrointestinal symptons
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline,60 days and 15 days after intervention conclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Determine gastrintestinais symptons related to the consumption of intervention.

arm_group.description: Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 1billion UFC Bifidobacterium lactis and sache of maltodextrin
Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 1billion UFC Bifidobacterium lactis and sache of fructooligosaccharide
Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 50g of gelatin and sache of maltodextrin

intervention.description: Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 1billion UFC Bifidobacterium lactis and sache of maltodextrin
Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 1billion UFC Bifidobacterium lactis and sache of fructooligosaccharide
Hypocaloric diet associated with capsule containing 50g of gelatin and sache of maltodextrin

overall_official.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

link.description: Institute of Nutrition Josué de Castro

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro
